document.full_text: the s&p 500 index inched upward on relatively light volume on wednesday, with investors adding to winning positions in technology stocks, but avoiding large bets ahead of corporate earnings due next week.
document.title: s&p 500 index edges higher on light volume
lines_and_colors: the s&p 500 index inched upward on relatively light volume on wednesday, with investors adding to winning positions in technology stocks, but avoiding large bets ahead of corporate earnings due next week.
